int TemplateCreator::ProcessEntry ( TGlobalData *  gData,
const TSetupData *  gSetup 
) [private, virtual]

The big kahuna. Overload this in the derived class and it will be called for each event.

Parameters:
gData Pointer to current map of all TPIs [ WILL CHANGE SHORTLY ]
gSetup Pointer to TSetupData for this run [ WILL CHANGE SHORTLY ]
Returns:
0 on success and non-zero on failure

Implements BaseModule.

00083     thePulseIslands = it->second;

00085

00087     std::string template_name = "hTemplate_" + detname;
00088     TH1D* hTemplate = NULL;
00089     if (fTemplates.find(detname) != fTemplates.end()) {

00091     }
00092 
00093     // Store a couple of numbers to get an idea of how many successful fits there are
00094     int& n_fit_attempts = fNFitAttempts[detname]; // number of pulses we try to fit to
00095     int& n_successful_fits = fNSuccessfulFits[detname];
00096     int& n_pulses_in_template = fNPulsesInTemplate[detname];
00097 
00098     // Loop through all the pulses
00099     for (PulseIslandList::iterator pulseIter = thePulseIslands.begin(); pulseIter != thePulseIslands.end(); ++pulseIter) {
00100 
00101       // First we will see how many candidate pulses there are on the TPI
00102       pulse_candidate_finder->FindPulseCandidates(*pulseIter);
00103       int n_pulse_candidates = pulse_candidate_finder->GetNPulseCandidates();
00104 
00105       // only continue if there is one pulse candidate on the TPI
00106       if (n_pulse_candidates == 1) {
00107 
00108         TPulseIsland* pulse = *pulseIter;
00109 
00110         // Add the first pulse directly to the template (although we may try and choose a random pulse to start with)
00111         if (hTemplate == NULL) {
00112           std::string histname = "hTemplate_" + detname;
00113           std::string histtitle = "Template Histogram for the " + detname + " channel";
00114 
00115           int pulse_length = pulse->GetSamples().size();
00116           if (pulse->GetPeakSample() >= pulse_length - pulse_length/5.0) {
00117             if (Debug()) {
00118               std::cout << "TemplateCreator: Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << " is too close to one end of the island and so won't be used as the first pulse in the template." << std::endl;
00119             }
00120             continue;
00121           }
00122           hTemplate = CreateRefinedPulseHistogram(pulse, histname.c_str(), histtitle.c_str(), true);
00123           ++n_pulses_in_template;
00124 
00125           if (Debug()) {
00126             std::cout << "TemplateCreator: Adding " << detname << " Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << " directly to the template" << std::endl;
00127           }
00128           fTemplates[detname] = hTemplate;
00129           continue;

00131 
00132         // Get the samples so we can check for digitiser overflow
00133         const std::vector<int>& theSamples = (pulse)->GetSamples();
00134         int n_samples = theSamples.size();
00135 
00136         // Calculate the maximum ADC value for this digitiser
00137         int n_bits = TSetupData::Instance()->GetNBits(bankname);
00138         double max_adc_value = std::pow(2, n_bits);
00139 
00140         // Loop through the samples and check for digitizer overflow
00141         bool overflowed = false;
00142         for (int i = 0; i < n_samples; ++i) {
00143           int sample_value = theSamples.at(i);
00144           if (sample_value >= max_adc_value-1 && sample_value <= max_adc_value+1) {
00145             if (Debug()) {
00146               std::cout << "TemplateCreator: Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << " has overflowed the digitizer and won't be added to the template" << std::endl;
00147             }
00148             overflowed = true;
00149             break;
00150           }
00151           else if (sample_value == 0) {
00152             if (Debug()) {
00153               std::cout << "TemplateCreator: Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << " has underflowed the digitizer and won't be added to the template" << std::endl;
00154             }
00155             overflowed = true;
00156             break;
00157           }
00158         }
00159         if (overflowed) {
00160           continue; // skip this pulse
00161         }
00162 
00163         // Create the refined pulse waveform
00164         TH1D* hPulseToFit = CreateRefinedPulseHistogram(pulse, "hPulseToFit", "hPulseToFit", false);
00165 
00166         // Create some histograms that monitor the progression of the template
00167         if (fErrorVsPulseAddedHistograms.find(detname) == fErrorVsPulseAddedHistograms.end()) {
00168           std::string error_histname = "hErrorVsPulseAdded_" + detname;
00169           std::string error_histtitle = "Plot of the Error as each new Pulse is added to the template for the " + detname + " channel";
00170           int n_bins = 10000;
00171           TH1D* error_hist = new TH1D(error_histname.c_str(), error_histtitle.c_str(), n_bins,0,n_bins);
00172           fErrorVsPulseAddedHistograms[detname] = error_hist;
00173         }
00174 
00175         // all the other pulses will be fitted to the template and then added to it
00176         // Get some initial estimates for the fitter
00177         double template_pedestal = hTemplate->GetBinContent(1);
00178         double template_amplitude;
00179         double template_time;
00180 
00181         double pulse_pedestal = hPulseToFit->GetBinContent(1);
00182         double pulse_amplitude;
00183         double pulse_time;
00184 
00185         double pedestal_offset_estimate = pulse_pedestal; // now we're dealing with actual pulses since we subtract the template_pedestal in the transformation
00186         double amplitude_scale_factor_estimate;
00187         double time_offset_estimate;
00188         if (TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname) == 1) { 
00189           template_amplitude = (hTemplate->GetMaximum() - template_pedestal);
00190           template_time = hTemplate->GetMaximumBin() - 1; // go from bin numbering (1, n_samples) to clock ticks (0, n_samples-1)
00191 
00192           pulse_amplitude = (hPulseToFit->GetMaximum() - pulse_pedestal);
00193           pulse_time = hPulseToFit->GetMaximumBin() - 1;
00194 
00195           amplitude_scale_factor_estimate = pulse_amplitude / template_amplitude;  // estimated scale factor
00196           time_offset_estimate = pulse_time - template_time;
00197         }
00198         else if (TSetupData::Instance()->GetTriggerPolarity(bankname) == -1) {
00199           template_amplitude = (template_pedestal - hTemplate->GetMinimum());
00200           template_time = hTemplate->GetMinimumBin() - 1; // go from bin numbering (1, n_samples) to clock ticks (0, n_samples-1)
00201 
00202           pulse_amplitude = (pulse_pedestal - hPulseToFit->GetMinimum());
00203           pulse_time = hPulseToFit->GetMinimumBin() - 1; // go from bin numbering (1, n_samples) to clock ticks (0, n_samples-1)
00204 
00205           amplitude_scale_factor_estimate = pulse_amplitude / template_amplitude;  // estimated scale factor
00206           time_offset_estimate = pulse_time - template_time;
00207         }
00208 
00209         fTemplateFitter->SetInitialParameterEstimates(pedestal_offset_estimate, amplitude_scale_factor_estimate, time_offset_estimate);
00210         
00211         if (Debug()) {
00212           std::cout << "TemplateCreator: " << detname << "(" << bankname << "): Pulse #" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << ": " << std::endl
00213                     << "TemplateCreator: Template: pedestal = " << template_pedestal << ", amplitude = " << template_amplitude << ", time = " << template_time << std::endl
00214                     << "TemplateCreator: Pulse: pedestal = " << pulse_pedestal << ", amplitude = " << pulse_amplitude << ", time = " << pulse_time << std::endl
00215                     << "TemplateCreator: Initial Estimates: pedestal = " << pedestal_offset_estimate << ", amplitude = " << amplitude_scale_factor_estimate 
00216                     << ", time = " << time_offset_estimate << std::endl;
00217         }
00218 
00219         int fit_status = fTemplateFitter->FitPulseToTemplate(hTemplate, hPulseToFit, bankname);
00220         ++n_fit_attempts;
00221         if (fit_status != 0) {
00222           if (Debug()) {
00223             std::cout << "TemplateCreator: Problem with fit (status = " << fit_status << ")" << std::endl;
00224           }
00225           delete hPulseToFit; // delete this here since it is no longer needed
00226           continue;
00227         }
00228         ++n_successful_fits;
00229 
00230         if (Debug()) {
00231           std::cout << "Template Creator: Fitted Parameters: PedOffset = " << fTemplateFitter->GetPedestalOffset() << ", AmpScaleFactor = " << fTemplateFitter->GetAmplitudeScaleFactor()
00232                     << ", TimeOffset = " << fTemplateFitter->GetTimeOffset() << ", Chi2 = " << fTemplateFitter->GetChi2() << ", NDoF = " << fTemplateFitter->GetNDoF() 
00233                     << ", Prob = " << TMath::Prob(fTemplateFitter->GetChi2(), fTemplateFitter->GetNDoF()) << std::endl << std::endl;
00234         }
00235 
00236         if (fPulseDebug) {
00237           // Print out some templates as we go along
00238           if (n_pulses_in_template <= 10 || 
00239               (n_pulses_in_template <= 100 && n_pulses_in_template%10 == 0) ||
00240               (n_pulses_in_template%100 == 0) ) {
00241             std::stringstream newhistname;
00242             newhistname << "hTemplate_" << n_pulses_in_template << "Pulses_" << detname;
00243             TH1D* new_template = (TH1D*) hTemplate->Clone(newhistname.str().c_str());
00244           }
00245         }
00246 
00247         // Add the pulse to the template (we'll do correct the sample values there)
00248         AddPulseToTemplate(hTemplate, hPulseToFit, bankname);
00249         ++n_pulses_in_template;
00250         
00251 
00252         if (fPulseDebug) {
00253           // Print out the uncorrected and corrected pulse that has been added to the template
00254 
00255           // Create the histograms that we will use to plot the corrected and uncorrected pulses
00256           std::stringstream histname;
00257           histname << template_name << "_Event" << EventNavigator::Instance().EntryNo() << "_Pulse" << pulseIter - thePulseIslands.begin() << "_" << n_pulses_in_template << "Added";
00258           TH1D* hUncorrectedPulse = (TH1D*) hPulseToFit->Clone(histname.str().c_str());
00259           histname << "_Corrected";
00260           TH1D* hCorrectedPulse = (TH1D*) hPulseToFit->Clone(histname.str().c_str());
00261           hCorrectedPulse->SetEntries(0); // set entries back to 0
00262           
00263           double pedestal_error = SetupNavigator::Instance()->GetNoise(bankname);
00264 
00265           // Loop through the bins of the uncorrected pulse and set the values in the corrected pulse histogram
00266           for (int iPulseBin = 1; iPulseBin <= hPulseToFit->GetNbinsX(); ++iPulseBin) {
00267             
00268             double uncorrected_value = hPulseToFit->GetBinContent(iPulseBin);
00269             double corrected_value = CorrectSampleValue(uncorrected_value, template_pedestal);
00270             
00271             hCorrectedPulse->SetBinContent(iPulseBin +0.5 - fTemplateFitter->GetTimeOffset(), corrected_value); 
00272             hCorrectedPulse->SetBinError(iPulseBin +0.5 - fTemplateFitter->GetTimeOffset(), pedestal_error);
00273           }
00274         }
00275 
00276         delete hPulseToFit;
00277 
00278         // we keep on adding pulses until adding pulses has no effect on the template
00279         bool converged = CheckConvergence(hTemplate, bankname);
00280         if (converged) {
00281           fConvergedStatuses[detname] = true;
00282           std::cout << "TemplateCreator: " << detname << " template terminated at iteration " << n_pulses_in_template << std::endl;
00283           break; // break from the for loop
00284         }
00285       } // end if only one pulse candidate
00286     } //end for loop through channels
00287   }
00288 
00289   return 0;
00290 }

int BaseModule::ProcessGenericEntry ( TGlobalData *  gData,
const TSetupData *  gSetup 
) [inherited]

Method called by the main event loop for each entry in the input root tree. Does some simple work, then hooks into the derived class through ProcessEntry.

Returns:
0 on sucess and non-zero if a problem occurred
